result.html: Bain díot do chótaTake off your coat.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċótaTake off your coat.

result.eng: She will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ga: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.orig: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.html: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ponchtml: Bainfiḋ sí an ceann díot má ḟeiceann sí ṫúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!

result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: Bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.eng: He took the picture off the wall.
result.ga: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.orig: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.html: Bhain sé an pictiúr den bhallaHe took the picture off the wall.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé an pictiúr den ḃallaHe took the picture off the wall.

result.html: Fuair mé lá saoireI got a day off.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé lá saoireI got a day off.

result.eng: Don't stand here, off you go!
result.html: Ná seas anseo imigh leatDon't stand here, off you go!
result.ponchtml: Ná seas anseo imiġ leatDon't stand here, off you go!

result.eng: People started getting off the train.
result.ga: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.orig: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.html: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.

result.eng: She started taking her clothes off.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.

result.html: Tóg den chathaoir éTake it off the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tóg den ċaṫaoir éTake it off the chair.

result.html: Bainigí díbh bhur gcótaíTake off your coats.
result.ponchtml: Bainigí díḃ ḃur gcótaíTake off your coats.

result.html: Bain díot do chaipínTake off your hat.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċaipínTake off your hat.

result.html: Bainigí díbh bhur gcótaíTake off your coats.
result.ponchtml: Bainigí díḃ ḃur gcótaíTake off your coats.

result.html: Bain díot do chuid éadaíTake off your clothes.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċuid éadaíTake off your clothes.

result.html: Bain díot do sheaicéadTake off your jacket.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ẛeaicéadTake off your jacket.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: Off to bed with the lot of you!
result.html: Greadaigí libh a luíOff to bed with the lot of you!
result.ponchtml: Greadaigí liḃ a luíOff to bed with the lot of you!
